casebody.data:
Inde COGGINS, Jerry Coggins and Coggins, Inc., a Hawai'i corporation, dba Splasher's Grill, Plaintiffs/Counterclaim Defendants-Appellees,
v.
KONA SEASIDE, INC., a Hawai'i corporation, Defendant/Counterclaim Plaintiff-Appellant,
and
John Does 1-10; Doe Corporations 1-10; Doe Entities, Defendants. NO. CAAP-15-0000904 Intermediate Court of Appeals of Hawai'i. DATED: Honolulu, Hawai'i, August 13, 2018.

MEMORANDUM OPINION

Affirmed.
